item.title: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk killed in Utah Valley University shooting
item.description: "We must all pray for Charlie Kirk, who has been shot," President Donald Trump wrote in a social media post.

item.title: Secret Service missed gun during search at Trump's golf club while president was there in August
item.description: The incident occurred about a year after two assassination attempts on Trump, including one while he was playing at his golf club in West Palm Beach, ...

item.title: Labor Department watchdog opens probe of BLS jobs, inflation data collection
item.description: President Donald Trump recently fired BLS Commissioner Erika McEntarfer in response to a weak monthly jobs report.

item.title: Trump appeals order blocking him from firing Fed Governor Lisa Cook
item.description: The Supreme Court is expected to make the final decision on the question of whether President Trump has legal cause to remove Cook from the Federal Re...

item.title: Detained workers from Hyundai, LG Energy Solution plant could soon fly home to South Korea
item.description: "Our nationals who had been detained by U.S. immigration authorities will soon be returning home," said South Korean President Lee Jae Myung.
